body_html:
@aselle But what was the motivation for using a binary on bazel? I tried to get this answer on StackOverflow but I'm still waiting.

For now, IMHO, the best solution is to ask bazel to compile these sources instead of downloading a binary.
body_text:
@aselle But what was the motivation for using a binary on bazel? I tried to get this answer on StackOverflow but I'm still waiting.
For now, IMHO, the best solution is to ask bazel to compile these sources instead of downloading a binary.
body:
@aselle But what was the motivation for using a binary on bazel? I tried to get this [answer on StackOverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44413137/why-does-bazels-rules-closure-downloads-platform-specific-binaries-instead-of-s) but I'm still waiting.

For now, IMHO, the best solution is to ask bazel to compile these sources instead of downloading a binary.
